main event: A reddish object in a 'V' formation was sighted for 10 seconds over Farmingdale, Long Island on 19 March 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared almost transparent with a dark center., The sighting lasted for only 10 seconds., Multiple conclusions were drawn about the nature of the object, including possible balloon or aircraft., Witness claims a very clear night made the sighting more distinct., The report classified the object as lighted and unknown.
sighted object: reddish, oval-shaped object in a 'V' formation
witness description: the sighting was reported with detailed observations of the object
